attributes.background: Your future depend on 1 piece of paper which you spend numerous years studying for. Under the conditions, test are a stressful way in checking how much a child has learnt, as it gets them all worked up and cannot relax and remember the answer. You may be the brightest child ever, but when it comes to tests, you fret so much that you can't rember anything. A few tests(GCSES) make up the mind of your future, meaning you may not peform as well as you could. Thats why the government needs to come up with a new solution.
